attributes.action: Ban Instagram from all mobile devices in the UK
attributes.additional_details: Instagram needs to be banned for the sake of the country and indeed the world, end the horror now!
attributes.background: Instagram makes us all feel terrible about ourselves and it is about time that it is banned to prohibit the feeling of unworthiness and ugliness. If beautiful people want to share their beautiful bodies, let them do it in peace for Christ sake!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament to ban specific social media platforms if they comply with the law.

You could start a new petition calling for new rules for social media companies if that is something you would like to see happen.
